title: Feb 18: {N} Where we are going with the autoencoder

cells.data:
## Research question:
With the advantage of the anthropomorophic hand and the EMG sensor: currently, hand is underactuated. But how do we make the most of the configuration space accessible through teleoperation?

## Idea:
Mapping to two different latent spaces -- one for the general grasp, and one for the individual finger pose.
